required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy in Premenopausal Women With Heavy Menstrual Bleeding (HMB) Associated With Uterine Fibroids (UF)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2b Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Elagolix in Premenopausal Women With Heavy Menstrual Bleeding Associated With Uterine Fibroids

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 2b randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study evaluating the safety and efficacy of elagolix alone and in combination with add-back therapy versus placebo on heavy menstrual bleeding in premenopausal women 18 to 51 years of age with uterine fibroids.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.description: Change in menstrual blood loss measured by alkaline hematin method

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in the number of subjects with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 through 6 months post dose
From 3 months prior to dosing up to 6 Months Post-dosing
From Day 1 up to 3 Months Post-dosing
secondary_outcome.description: Chemistry, Urinalysis, complete blood count, bone biomarkers, lipid profile

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects with reduction in Menstrual Blood Loss
Percentage of Subjects with No Bleeding (spotting allowed)
Percent Change from baseline in bleeding scores per bleeding diary

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 3 months prior to dosing through 6 months post-dosing

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in percentage of subjects with hypoestrogenic effects
Change from Baseline in the percent of subjects with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 through 6 months post dose

arm_group.description: Elagolix Dose 1 plus E2/NETA (estradiol/norethindrone acetate) Dose 1
Elagolix Dose 1 plus E2/NETA (estradiol/norethindrone acetate) Dose 2
Elagolix Dose 2 plus E2/NETA (estradiol/norethindrone acetate) Dose 1
Elagolix Dose 2 plus E2/NETA (estradiol/norethindrone acetate) Dose 2

intervention.description: Elagolix Dose 1 for 6 Month treatment Period
Elagolix Dose 2 for 6 Month Treatment Period

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject is pre-menopausal female 18 to 51 years of age at Screening.
- Subject has diagnosis of uterine fibroids documented by a Pelvic Ultrasound.
- Subject has heavy uterine bleeding associated with uterine fibroids.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject has had a myomectomy, uterine artery embolization or high intensity focused ultrasound for fibroid destruction within 1 year prior to randomization or any history of endometrial ablation.
- Subject has a history of osteoporosis or other metabolic bone disease.
- Subject shows evidence of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric (including depression), or neurologic diseases or any uncontrolled medical illness such as uncontrolled type 2 diabetes.
- Subject has a history of clinically significant condition(s) including but not limited to: * Symptomatic Endometriosis * Epilepsy or seizures * Type 1 diabetes * Chronic kidney disease * Any cancer (except basal cell carcinoma of the skin), including breast or ovarian cancer or subject has taken any systemic cancer chemotherapy
